testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with a configured feature messages and a layout variant 4

testcase.name: puts these messages into a single view list (R1.6)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with a configured feature messages when messages were received

testcase.name: sorts the messages by configured resources and for each resource by sortKey (R1.7)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with a configured feature messages when messages were received

testcase.name: those messages are merged using the highest level at the first position the message occurred (R1.8, R1.9)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with a configured feature messages when multiple messages with same text are received

testcase.name: there is no visible button to dismiss a message (R2.1)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with feature dismiss when the feature is disabled

testcase.name: there is a visible button to dismiss a message (R2.2)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with feature dismiss when the feature is enabled

testcase.name: there is no visible dismiss button (R2.3)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with feature dismiss when the feature is enabled for variant 1 (no alert)

testcase.name: all messages can be deleted together (R2.3)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with feature dismiss when the feature is enabled for variant 2 (one alert for all messages)

testcase.name: there is only one visible dismiss button deleting all messages (R2.3)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with feature dismiss when the feature is enabled for variant 2 (one alert for all messages)

testcase.name: each message receives a visible dismiss button (R2.3)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with feature dismiss when the feature is enabled for variant 3 (one alert per error class)

testcase.name: each message receives a visible dismiss button (R2.3)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with feature dismiss when the feature is enabled for variant 4 (one alert per message)

testcase.name: the internal status does not change to a lower level (R2.4)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with feature dismiss when the feature is enabled and the level changes on dismiss

testcase.name: those will be displayed (R2.5)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with feature dismiss when there are dismissed messages and new messages arrive

testcase.name: dismissed will remain hidden (R2.5)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with feature dismiss when there are dismissed messages and new messages arrive

testcase.name: they will be displayed again (R2.5)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with feature dismiss when there are dismissed messages and new messages arrive when dismissed messages get renewed by didValidate events

testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-messages-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-messages-widget with feature blank
